items.title: Supervisor Leadership Skills for a Safe Workplace

visible_instructors.name: Marie-Claire
visible_instructors.title: Marie-Claire Ross
visible_instructors.job_title: Author, Transform Your Safety Communication

items.headline: Learn safety communication skills to foster safety accountability, responsibility and correct safety behaviours.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will be able to understand your pivotal role in managing safety performance and will have a variety of skills to use, in order to engage, communicate and lead on safety.
In this course, you will learn:
The importance of being a supervisor and why supervisors are the linchpins in a safe workplace, when it comes to maintaining safety.
